characters.name: Maika Sakuranomiya
characters.description:
**Height:** 156 cm (5'1")
**Character:** Sadistic

Because she usually has an unpleasant look in her eyes, she was worried that she didn't pass the interview, but the shop manager hired her to work at Stile. Her dream is to one day study abroad. She is the "Do S" (extreme sadist) waitress.

characters.name: Mafuyu Hoshikawa
characters.description:
__Height:__ 135 cm (4'9")
__Character:__ Little Sister

She looks young but she is actually a college student. She's usually quite calm but when she starts work she becomes a sparkling "little sister" character. She loves children's anime. She is the "little sister" waitress.

characters.name: Kaho Hinata
characters.description:
__Height:__ 165 cm (5'4")
__Character:__ Tsundere

A popular blond, twin-tailed high school shop clerk who is so obsessed with games that sometimes leads her to spend too much money on it.

characters.name: Kouyou Akizuki
characters.description: He is in charge of the kitchen at Stile. He loves yuri.

characters.name: Dino
characters.description:
He is Italian, and scouted Maika to work at Stile. He has a bad habit of getting a nosebleed when he gets too excited.
He has a crush on Maika Sakuranomiya.

characters.name: Hideri Kanzaki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 150 cm (4'11")
__Character:__ Idol

An employee at Stile who dreams of becoming a cute idol.

characters.name: Miu Amano
characters.description:
**Height:** 163 cm (5'4")
**Character:** Big Sister

She normally wears glasses and is active in a doujin circle. She is the "older sister" waitress at Stile, but surprisingly, she is easily excitable.

characters.name: Owner
characters.description:
Owner is Dinos company dog

However, he is friendly dog always happy around Maika Sakuranomiya and sometimes Owner likes to lick Dino who takes care of him.

That being said, he's known to have more of a 'jerkish' side to him, such as him biting Dino for no reason when he and Maika were at the park or threatening to dismantle Dino's figures if he didn't give him walks. He also tends to have a mind of his own, namely feigning innocence.

characters.name: Aika Sakuranomiya
characters.description:
Aika Sakuranomiya is the older sister of Maika Sakuranomiya. 

Aika is a cute and kind older sister who cares for her family and tends to worry about Maika Sakuranomiya's social life because of her scary eyes. Her care for her sister has been shown many times as she tries to help whenever she can.

characters.name: Shinobu Oomiya
characters.description: A graceful and air headed 15-year old girl. She previously stayed over at Alice's home in England, although she herself is rather bad at English and has generally bad grades.  Shinobu has taken a liking to the English language and often tries to find opportunities to act like an English person. She has tried reading English newspapers (though she doesn't, if not, barely understands any of it) and even tried to listen in on Alice and Karen's conversations when they are speaking in English.

characters.name: Hifumi Takimoto
characters.description:
__Height:__ 162 cm

Takimoto Hifumi is a character designer ~!(currently character team leader)!~ for Eagle Jump, a gaming studio located in Tokyo.

Hifumi is especially shy to the point of avoiding talking to people or looking at them directly. As a result, in order to not make her feel uncomfortable, the other employees interact with her through the company's computer messenger system. Although, in later seasons she becomes more lively and goes out of her way to try to improve talking to people. 

Contrary to her normal personality, she becomes very lively, outgoing, and cheerful while texting or messaging, often using emoticons in chat. She secretly enjoys cosplay and owns a pet hedgehog named Sojiro.

Some trivia about Hifumi:
- Her favorite colors are Blue and Pink
- Her favorite clothing style is "Sweet Lolita"
